}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This device is '''3Com''' P/N 16-0340-000. This particular card is a '''Rev. A''' card. :The '''3Com''' logo, "ALL RIGHTS RESERVED", and "ASSY 03-0206-000 REV-D" is silkscreened on the top of the card. :"FAB 02-0206-000 REV B" and "ELEC1G-04B" (among other things) is etched onto the bottom layer of the card. :The MAC is labeled with... :*'''''Parallel Tasking II''''' :*'''PERFORMANCE''' :*3Com 40-0607-002 :*0035S 37034432 :*LUCENT 40-06073 :The PHY is labeled with... :*'''TDK''' :*78Q2120-CGT :*ZG0028P11 :*18664.04 :There is a '''SST''' SST39VF010-90-4C-WH 1Mbit Flash on-board. :The Ethernet Transformer is a [http://www.mouser.com/ds/2/336/H304-27481.pdf '''Pulse''' H0009].
Per the H0009's datasheet (and assuming a position of card insertion [Front Facing, CardBus strip UP]), the Ethernet data pins are 5 (Tx'''-'''), 6 (Tx'''+'''), 7 (Rx'''-'''), and 8 (Rx'''+''').
The copyright year on the back of the card is 1999.
[[Category:English Documentation]]
